pull.title: clarify abortrescan rpc use
pull.body: `-rescan` during startup doesn't apply since RPC has not warmed up by that point

events.body:
Would have to be overhauled once https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11200 goes in.
Maybe instead of "Include", "exclude" the startup `-rescan`?
Not clear to me that #11200 fixes this from -cli?

Sorry.. Your right, wrong direction. The only nitpick would be if GUI Console commands are RPC commands.

ACK 8b2c7330d09fd9dee93b3f44881437b17766aea3
